3.2.1. pypago.coords.create_coord¶

pypago.coords.create_coord(modelname, filename)¶

Returns a Coord object, depending on the modelname

Parameters:
  • modelname (str) – Name of the model
  • filename (str) – Name of the NetCDF mesh file
